name: Figures Of Heroes
description:
The owner has been missing for some time, the other toys and video game characters have grown restless. In search for answers the ancient texts were found and they are sparking adventure in the toys, they go to battle to find answers and delve in the Owners realm further.

Choose a team of 4 toys and game characters to fight your way through waves of enemies, build your deck of cards to improve your chances and gain relics that once belonged to the owner.

  • Build your team of Toys and Video game characters.

  • Utilize each character's unique cards that can be upgraded.

  • Build up your deck by defeating enemies or finding chests.

  • Start an adventure that is randomized to gain currency to improve future adventures.

  • Choose your destination on your adventure, your options are random so choose carefully. The more enemies defeated the weaker the final boss is but you may miss out of better cards or upgrades.

  • Find lost items that power up your team.

  • Unique enemies and bosses.
